Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Lisa A.
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my husband who drives truck so far work good for himTime will tell how it handles the bumps

Reviews.Title: Nice RV TV
Reviews.Author: Teriza349
Reviews.Content: I am giving this 5 stars as I am very pleased with the tv. It is all it was advertised to be. Would recommend to others.

ProductInfo.Features:
12V DC Power. Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner. High performance wide 16:9 LCD panel
HDTV Ready (1080p, 720p, 480p). Convenient front controls
Dual function wireless remote control included (TV/DVD)
VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern. DC power cord included
CEC function with AWM975 or other Jensen CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players. CEC feature allows you to control the operation of the TV and DVD player with one remote
ProductInfo.Name: Jensen JE1912LED 19" 12 Volt LED LCD TV
